project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests).
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API.
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.
Display the fetched weather data (temperature, humidity, and weather conditions) in the terminal.
Write tests for all the functionalities implemented above.
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they work correctly.
